item.title: Multi
item.dc:creator: @i0wnuall i0wnuall
item.description:
@i0wnuall wrote:

o ok[br][size=1]Posted on: March 31, 2007, 08:41:21 PM[/size][hr]if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 93) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==true)) { startAnimation(1979); hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(35); castOnPlayer.entangle(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); actionTimer = 10; stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("You freeze the enemy!"); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 2); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(555), 6); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); }
now what i found the second one…[br][size=1]Posted on: March 31, 2007, 08:46:17 PM[/size][hr]anyone know??

item.title: Multi
item.dc:creator: @i0wnuall i0wnuall
item.description:
@i0wnuall wrote:

wait how do i know what the ice barrage case is?[br][size=1]Posted on: March 31, 2007, 08:28:11 PM[/size][hr]if(magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= -93 && playerLevel[3] >= 1) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 6)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 6)==true)) { deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1); deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1); deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1); startAnimation(1979); attackNPCSWithin(369, 39, 0); //hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(30); server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!"); //stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }
theres my code what i need to change?

Read full topic

item.title: Multi
item.dc:creator: @0uch_a_arr0w 0uch a arr0w
item.description:
@0uch_a_arr0w wrote:

if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] > -124) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); sendMessage("You need 40 "+getItemName(560)+", 40 "+getItemName(4278)+" and 60 "+getItemName(554)); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==true)) { hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(39); startAnimation(1979); attackPlayersWithin(369, 39, 0); castOnPlayer.PoisonPlayer(); castOnPlayer.uberentangle(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; //stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); //castOnPlayer.stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!"); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 40); deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 40); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 60); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 124) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 125 to cast this spell."); } }

Sum it all up.

Read full topic
